mapper.select: SELECT T_APV_APPROVAL.PK_APPROVAL_ID, T_APV_APPROVAL.NEXT_APPROVAL, T_APV_APPROVAL.DATA_TYPE, T_APV_APPROVAL.APV_STATION, T_APV_APPROVAL.IS_ENDING, T_APV_APPROVAL.IS_START, T_APV_APVTYPE.APVTYPE_NAME as APPROVAL_TYPE, T_STAFF_INFO.STAFF_NAME as APPROVAL_PEOPLE FROM T_APV_APPROVAL INNER JOIN T_APV_APVTYPE ON T_APV_APPROVAL.APPROVAL_TYPE = T_APV_APVTYPE.PK_APVTYPE_ID INNER JOIN T_STAFF_INFO ON T_APV_APPROVAL.APPROVAL_PEOPLE = T_STAFF_INFO.PK_STAFF_ID WHERE T_APV_APPROVAL.IS_ENDING = 1
